title: Root parsley soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons salted butter', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1/2 teaspoon minced fresh root ginger', '1 carrot, thinly sliced', '1 stick celery, thinly sliced', '6 root parsley, peeled and chopped', '600ml vegetable stock', '1/4 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', 'chopped fresh parsley, to taste', 'single cream, to taste']
